data.eml:eml: A redescription of the species of Eupolybothrus Verhoeff s. str. preserved in the British Museum (Natural History) and the Hope departement of Zoology Oxford (Chilopoda Lithobiomorpha)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article E. H. Eason (1970): A redescription of the species of Eupolybothrus Verhoeff s. str. preserved in the British Museum (Natural History) and the Hope departement of Zoology Oxford (Chilopoda Lithobiomorpha). Bulletin of the British Museum (Natural History), Zoology 19: 289-310, URL: http://un.availab.le
